Package Core

Class Summary
AjaxServer  
AjaxUtil  
Base64 Encodes and decodes to and from Base64 notation.
Base64.InputStream A Base64.InputStream will read data from another java.io.InputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.
Base64.OutputStream A Base64.OutputStream will write data to another java.io.OutputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.
FileData Used by FileManager.java for Vicar Collection information.
FileDownload Reads a specified data file from the directory structure into a ServletOutputStream for delivery to a browser via http.
FileManager Implements the collections structure in a unix directory and provides a way for the user to invoke Abbot.
Simple Provides a simple structure for demonstrating various components of vicar while under development and is not intended to be part of the final product.
ZipUtil Utilities for zip/unzip, gzip/gunzip, and tar/untar.
